com.vdisk.net

类 VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • com.vdisk.net.VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    封闭类:
    VDiskAPI<SESS_T extends Session>

    public static class VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream
extends FilterInputStream
    An InputStream for a file download that includes the associated VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo. Closing this stream will cancel the associated download request.

    • 字段概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Closes this stream and aborts the request to VDisk, releasing any associated resources. No more bytes will be downloaded after this is called.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 Closeable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 AutoCloseable
        覆盖:
        close 在类中 FilterInputStream
        抛出:
        IOException - if an error occurs while closing this stream.

      • getFileInfo

        public VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo getFileInfo()
        Returns the VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo for the associated file.

      • copyStreamToOutput

        public void copyStreamToOutput(OutputStream os,
                      File targetFile,
                      ProgressListener listener,
                      boolean isThumnail)
                        throws VDiskIOException,
                               VDiskPartialFileException,
                               VDiskLocalStorageFullException
        Copies from a VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream to an OutputStream, optionally providing updates via a ProgressListener. You probably won't have a use for this function because most API functions that return a VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream have an alternate that will copy to an OutputStream for you.
        参数:
        os - the stream to copy to.
        listener - an optional ProgressListener to receive progress updates as the stream is copied, or null.
        抛出:
        VDiskPartialFileException - if only part of the input stream was copied.
        VDiskIOException - for network-related errors.
        VDiskLocalStorageFullException - if there is no more room to write to the output stream.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.
